price: 8. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeysan oo samaha fala. Waxay leeyihiin abaal gud aan go’eynin (Janno).
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun ghayru mamnūnin
